body:

body:
Making the enemy live up to their own book of rules is useful.

But never forget that the rules the enemy pretends to believe in are all lies.  They don't give a rat's ass about trannies any more than they care about women, or "minorities" or any other group of people they pretend are being oppressed.

Leftists are evil, and lies are their native language.  Everything they say is a con.  Power is the only thing they care about.
